      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox22096470">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="22096470">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title22096470">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Databases
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content22096470">
          <div id="boxatt22096470" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25573179">
              <a id="link_25573179" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25573179,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Operations and Information Systems', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344568}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text of thousands of newspapers, magazines, broadcast transcripts, business publications, legal materials, and more, with coverage in the main from 1980 to present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25573175">
              <a id="link_25573175" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www3.valueline.com/is/5000index.aspx" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25573175,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Operations and Information Systems', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12730980}); ">
               ValueLine
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides information on U.S. companies that sell stock. Information includes graphs, charts, ratings, and peer group analysis.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>

         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title22096476">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content22096476">
          <div id="boxatt22096476" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25573165">
              <a id="link_25573165" href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25573165,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Operations and Information Systems', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25573165}); ">
               Trexler Library Citation Guides
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Brief, easy-to-use guides to the 3 most used citation styles: APA, Chicago (Turabian), MLA.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25573166">
              <a id="link_25573166" href="http://www.zotero.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25573166,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Operations and Information Systems', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25573166}); ">
               Zotero
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Free citation tool. Does the citing for you! Loved by librarians, professors, and students alike.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
